title: 45  Liya Yakovlevna Raitser, VKB/P (The Communist Party), 1929
publication_title: The Modern Series at the Art Institute of Chicago
content:
<section class="osci-tk-epub-section tombstone" id="tombstone">45  
Designed by Liya Yakovlevna Raitser (Russian, 1902–1988)  
Manufacturer unknown (Russia)  
VKB/P (The Communist Party)  
1929  
Cotton, plain weave; block-, roller-, or screen-printed; 13.3 × 9.2 cm (5 1/4 × 3 5/8 in.)  
Harriott A. Fox and Mrs. Siegfried G. Schmidt endowments, 1993.54

</section><section id="figures">Liya Yakovlevna Raitser, VKB/P (The Communist Party), 1929.
